Text: Thank you! Tornado warnings mean I won't get this till tomorrow!
you're welcome. Atlantan are you in georgia? i had a rough drive today in tennessee.

Thank you as always.  Just curious as to why the files are so big the last few months.  It use to be around 18 - 20 mb but now they are all in the 40 mb range.   Even the extra covers don't take up that much space ?

1920 pixel-width images, up from 1280 pixel-width (i compared this issue to #10 from the same scanner) resulting in over twice the total px number for every page.

beyond that, i don't know and i don't care. if the file's too big, buy a paper copy.
